meanings.sent1: He always outsmokes his friends when they have a smoke break.
meanings.sent2: She outsmokes everyone in the office with her smoking skills.
meanings.sent3: The little chimney outsmokes the big chimney in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outsmoke her opponents is like a wildfire burning bright.
meanings.sent5: The race to outsmoke each other was intense and filled with smoke clouds.

meanings.definition: To defeat in a smoking competition
meanings.sent1: In the smoking contest, he managed to outsmoke all his competitors.
meanings.sent2: She outsmokes her rivals effortlessly in every smoking challenge.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to outsmoke the dog in a funny smoking duel.
meanings.sent4: His strategy to outsmoke the opponent was like a clever chess move.
meanings.sent5: The champion outsmokes all others with his unbeatable smoking techniques.
